passive.name: A New Round of Shuffling
passive.description: Increases the wearer's DEF by <orangeStrong>{{1}}%</orangeStrong>. When the wearer is attacked, there is a <orangeStrong>{{2}}%</orangeStrong> base chance to Burn the enemy. For each turn, the wearer deals DoT that is equal to <orangeStrong>{{3}}%</orangeStrong> of the wearer's DEF for {{4}} turn(s).
